aws_account_id                    = "<your_account_id>"
aws_access_key_id                 = "<your_access_key_id>"
aws_secret_access_key             = "<your_secret_access_key>"
domain                            = "sdp-dev"
ecr_repository                    = "tech-audit-tool-api" # ECR repository name where the lambda image is stored
tech_audit_data_bucket_name       = "sdp-dev-tech-audit-tool-api" # S3 bucket name where the tech audit data is stored
tech_audit_secret_manager_name    = "sdp-dev-tech-audit-tool-api/secrets" # Secrets Manager secret name for tech audit data
